genes.title: æ ¸å¿ƒç‰¹æ€§
genes.content: - [LLM Application Observability](https://langfuse.com/docs/tracing): Instrument your app and start ingesting traces to Langfuse, thereby tracking LLM calls and other relevant logic in your app such as retrieval, embedding, or agent actions. Inspect and debug complex logs and user sessions. Try the interactive [demo](https://langfuse.com/docs/demo) to see this in action. - [Prompt Management](https://langfuse.com/docs/prompt-management/get-started)
